It often feels like a maths exam you didn't prep for.

unnormalised: The real fun begins when you start involving other countries. Scheduling a Zoom call with someone in, say, California? Prepare for a headache. Don't even mention trying to coordinate with Australia – it's like trying to herd cats across continents.

And don't get me started on Indian weddings – a 3-day affair meticulously planned down to the minute, yet somehow always running 2 hrs late.
